original_text: And ye shall not go out of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation in seven days, until the days of your consecration be at an end: for seven days shall he consecrate you.
korean_text: 위임식은 이레 동안 행하나니 위임식이 끝나는 날까지 이레 동안은 회막 문에 나가지 말라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall not go out of the door
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 문 밖으로 나가지 말라

sentences.original_text: of the tabernacle of the congregation
until the days of your consecration be at an end
for seven days shall he consecrate you
